about_the_game:
Story:
You're a third-rate actor who's been around for a long time and just recently took on a well-paid movie role
You would be leading a prosperous life had you not been killed by a drunken girl who caught her boyfriend cheating on her in the nightclub.
What’s worst, you have been sent to eternal hell for making religious jokes when trying to pick up girls

In this chaos, a fallen angel who is “The Secretary” tells you that the only way to end your eternal suffering is to nurture and command and command the Devil’s Maidens to fight back against the Seven Deadly Sins that have taken over and torn Hell apart.
And so, you will nurture the Devils girls in this Hell full of weird and exotic landscapes and live a soul-stirring and ravaged daily life♂♀

Game features:✝

◆ Relaxed turn-based card battles
◆ Easy and fun card combination
◆ Interact and talk with cute characters
◆ Nurture and command the devil girls to fight in battle
◆ A witty and entertaining plot where you will be the ‘candidate’ to restore Hell to its former glory
Explore Hell together and discover the hidden truths!

content_descriptors.notes: Contains obscene jokes and adult content
